verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!\f + \fr 112:1 \ft Psalm 112 is an acrostic poem, with each verse after the initial “Praise the LORD!” starting with a letter of the alphabet (ordered from Alef to Tav).\f* Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w fears|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w delights|strong="H2654"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

\w His|strong="H1288"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w in|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* land. \w The|strong="H1288"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w Wealth|strong="H1952"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5975"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w His|strong="H5975"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w endures|strong="H5975"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*.

Light dawns \w in|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H3477"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w for|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H3477"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w*, \w and|strong="H2587"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w It|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* deals \w graciously|strong="H2603"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w lends|strong="H3867"\w*. \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w maintain|strong="H3557"\w* \w his|strong="H3557"\w* \w cause|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2143"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w news|strong="H8052"\w*. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3559"\w*, trusting \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7200"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w established|strong="H5564"\w*. \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* end \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H3519"\w* \w dispersed|strong="H6340"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H3519"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* poor. \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w endures|strong="H5975"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*. \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* \w with|strong="H7161"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w grieved|strong="H3707"\w*. \w He|strong="H8378"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w gnash|strong="H2786"\w* \w with|strong="H3707"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w melt|strong="H4549"\w* \w away|strong="H4549"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* perish.
